titre: Science Please! : The Internal Combustion Engine

synopsis: Spun in the form of an extended beat poem, Requiem for Poets and Dogs tells the tale of an eclectic group of homeless rooftop squatters who spend one last eternal day trying to cope with the misery of their existence through humor, fighting, and distraction before facing their inevitable eviction from their beloved armpit of Tokyo

titre: Fluminense Football Club - Centenário de uma Paixão
